attributes.action: Don’t ban social media for under 16s
attributes.additional_details: because it’s some people’s jobs and get paid for doing it and it helps kids mentally with school work and life
attributes.background: either not make the social media ban to come in effect or make it so that it’s under 13s as most apps don’t allow under 13s

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Do not ban social media for under 16s" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/757233
